start.welcome:
Hi 👋 
We are glad that you have joined us! Here you can create prayer needs, track their status, and we will remind you to pray for them 🙏
start.welcome_back:
Hi, we are glad to see you again 👋 
Check your prayer needs and pray!

create_need.welcome: Create a need by sending it as a message to us.
create_need.success_message:
Hurray, your prayer is created 🎉 
Now you can track its status!

list_need.welcome:
Here you can track the status of your prayers. 

🙏 - means that you are actively praying for this need. 
✅ - means that the Father answered your need.
list_need.available_action:
Try to click on a prayer. 
So you can change her status or delete her.

common.middleware_message: Create prayers, track their status and pray with us 🚀
